data.text:
John Lennon are a lover of all that is beautiful, whether it is a work of art, a pleasant landscape or a person of good appearance. Not only do John Lennon value beauty as measured by the eye, but John Lennon are attracted also by beauty in other forms. Good music appeals to John Lennon, a good character possessed by an individual appeals to John Lennon. John Lennon are a connoisseur of everything that is above ordinary.John Lennon have a gift for making other people happy. John Lennon know how to comfort those who are troubled and John Lennon know how to make them pleased with themselves. This is a rare gift and there are not enough people like John Lennon in the world.John Lennon are not as practical as some people, and in keeping appointments, John Lennon are not too punctual.John Lennon are somewhat over-sensitive and there are times when John Lennon are put out needlessly. But John Lennon's displeasure does not show itself in the form of a squabble. Disharmony is a thing John Lennon avoid at all costs. May be, John Lennon nurse a grievance, but this is something that others are never allowed to sense. John Lennon keep it strictly to John Lennon'sself.

John Lennon are idealistic and inspiring to others, for John Lennon have inherent spiritual faith. Extremely sensitive, John Lennon are well liked - John Lennon rarely hurt others' feeling. John Lennon's happiness comes from the realisation that the difficulties of life are the lessons that John Lennon have to learn to become a complete individual.John Lennon have the habit of keeping grave secrets, which will help John Lennon in getting hold of extraordinary subjects which wonâ€™t be the cup of tea for many. On the other hand, John Lennon may face adverse circumstances in John Lennon's formal education. John Lennon can overcome these challenges if John Lennon work hard with complete dedication. John Lennon should pay attention towards John Lennon's studies and perform John Lennon's revisions regularly. This should be done so that John Lennon can imbibe all the knowledge John Lennon have acquired. Select John Lennon's company wisely as negative companionship can cause hurdles in John Lennon's studies. Situations may turn against John Lennon sometimes, but John Lennon should take the initiative and not let John Lennon's educational life fall apart.
